text: Viktor Mykolayovych Tikhonov (5 March 1949 - 29 August 2020) was a Ukrainian politician. He was born in the Antratsyt Raion, Ukraine. During the Mykola Azarov cabinet, he was the First Vice Prime Minister between 11 March 2010 through 1 June 2011. He was a member of the Verkhovna Rada between 1994 through 2014. Tikhonov died of pneumonia on 29 August 2020 in Simferopol, Ukraine at the age of 71.Азаров: Помер колишній віце-прем'єр України ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Viktor Mykolayovych Tikhonov
